verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the territories] <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5157>inherited<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the households of the <S%H1>tribes<s%> of the <S%H4294>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>Israel<s%> <S%H3478>apportioned<s%> to them for an <S%H5157>inheritance,<s%>

by the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> for the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and the half-tribe.

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and the half-tribe <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> but he did not <S%H5414>give<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and they did not <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H2506>portion<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>live<s%> in, with their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> for their <S%H4735>livestock<s%> and for their <S%H7075>property.<s%>

<S%H3651>Thus<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "You <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H182><s%> you and me in Kadesh-barnea.

"I was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me from Kadesh-barnea to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out the <S%H776>land,<s%> and I <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to him as [it was] in my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

"Nevertheless my <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with me made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4529>melt<s%> with <S%H4529>fear;<s%> but I <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4390>fully.<s%>

"So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>'Surely<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H1869>trodden<s%> shall be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to you and to your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4390>fully.<s%>'

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has let me <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> forty-five <S%H8141>years,<s%> from the <S%H227>time<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am eighty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H3117>today.<s%>

"I am <S%H5750>still<s%> as <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> as I was in the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me; as my <S%H3581>strength<s%> was <S%H227>then,<s%> so my <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H6258>now,<s%> for <S%H4421>war<s%> and for <S%H3318>going<s%> out and <S%H935>coming<s%> in.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then, <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> about <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> for you <S%H8085>heard<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> [were] <S%H8033>there,<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be with me, and I shall <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"
So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4390>fully.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> was <S%H6440>formerly<s%> Kiriath-arba; [for Arba] was the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among the <S%H6062>Anakim.<s%> Then the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8252>had<s%> <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
